import React, { setValue, Component } from 'react'; import ToggleButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ToggleButtonGroup'; import ToggleButton from 'react-bootstrap/ToggleButton'; import DropdownButton from 'react-bootstrap/DropdownButton' import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown' class Buttons extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { Gender: "", Orientation: "", Meeting: "", Name: "", Education: "", School: "", Occupation: "" } //this.handleChange=this.handleChange.bind(this) } // handleChange(event){ // [this.setState.Gender]: event.currentTarget.value // } render(){ return(
Man Woman
Hetrosexual Bisexual
Hetrosexual Woman Bisexual Woman Both

High School Bachelor Master Doctorate PG Diploma
Dropdown item text School 1 School 2 School 3
Dropdown item text Pro 1 Pro 2 Pro 3

) } } export default Buttons
